verses.plain: I lifted up mine eyes again, and looked, and behold a man with a measuring line in his hand.

tokens.t: I lifted up mine eyes again, and looked, and behold a man with a measuring line in his hand.

verses.plain: Then said I, Whither goest thou? And he said unto me, To measure Jerusalem, to see what is the breadth thereof, and what is the length thereof.

tokens.t: Then said I, Whither goest thou? And he said unto me, To measure Jerusalem, to see what
the breadth thereof, and what
the length thereof.

verses.plain: And, behold, the angel that talked with me went forth, and another angel went out to meet him,

tokens.t: And, behold, the angel that talked with me went forth, and another angel went out to meet him,

verses.plain: And said unto him, Run, speak to this young man, saying, Jerusalem shall be inhabited as towns without walls for the multitude of men and cattle therein:

tokens.t: And said unto him, Run, speak to this young man, saying, Jerusalem shall be inhabited
towns without walls for the multitude of men and cattle therein:

verses.plain: For I, saith the LORD, will be unto her a wall of fire round about, and will be the glory in the midst of her.

tokens.t: For I, saith the
, will be unto her a wall of fire round about, and will be the glory in the midst of her.

verses.plain: ¶ Ho, ho, come forth, and flee from the land of the north, saith the LORD: for I have spread you abroad as the four winds of the heaven, saith the LORD.

tokens.t: ¶ Ho, ho,
, and flee from the land of the north, saith the
: for I have spread you abroad as the four winds of the heaven, saith the

verses.plain: Deliver thyself, O Zion, that dwellest with the daughter of Babylon.

tokens.t: Deliver thyself, O Zion, that dwellest
the daughter of Babylon.

verses.plain: For thus saith the LORD of hosts; After the glory hath he sent me unto the nations which spoiled you: for he that toucheth you toucheth the apple of his eye.

tokens.t: For thus saith the
of hosts; After the glory hath he sent me unto the nations which spoiled you: for he that toucheth you toucheth the apple of his eye.

verses.plain: For, behold, I will shake mine hand upon them, and they shall be a spoil to their servants: and ye shall know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me.

tokens.t: For, behold, I will shake mine hand upon them, and they shall be a spoil to their servants: and ye shall know that the
of hosts hath sent me.

verses.plain: ¶ Sing and rejoice, O daughter of Zion: for, lo, I come, and I will dwell in the midst of thee, saith the LORD.

tokens.t: ¶ Sing and rejoice, O daughter of Zion: for, lo, I come, and I will dwell in the midst of thee, saith the

verses.plain: And many nations shall be joined to the LORD in that day, and shall be my people: and I will dwell in the midst of thee, and thou shalt know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me unto thee.

tokens.t: And many nations shall be joined to the
in that day, and shall be my people: and I will dwell in the midst of thee, and thou shalt know that the
of hosts hath sent me unto thee.

verses.plain: And the LORD shall inherit Judah his portion in the holy land, and shall choose Jerusalem again.

tokens.t: And the
shall inherit Judah his portion in the holy land, and shall choose Jerusalem again.

verses.plain: Be silent, O all flesh, before the LORD: for he is raised up out of his holy habitation.

tokens.t: Be silent, O all flesh, before the
: for he is raised up out of his holy habitation.

footnotes.text: his…: Heb. the habitation of his holiness
